name: The Orion Suns
description: How beautiful the night sky is, how many secrets hides the shroud of cosmic void. Anna the researcher needs your help. You need to create constellations in different orders to make a map of the night sky. The task is not for a weak spirit, but quite feasible, besides Anna will provide you all possible assistance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
